properties.entry: SELECT MEM_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , MEM_NAME , MEM_NICKNAME , MEM_EMAIL , MEM_PHONE , MEM_ADDR , GENDER , MEM_BIRTH , MEM_PROFILE , INTEREST , GRADE , ENROLL_DATE , MEM_UPDATE , MEM_STATUS , MEM_DROP FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = ? AND MEM_PWD = ? AND MEM_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT MEM_NO FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_EMAIL = ?

INSERT INTO MEMBER ( MEM_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , MEM_NAME , MEM_NICKNAME , MEM_EMAIL , MEM_PHONE , MEM_ADDR , GENDER , MEM_BIRTH , MEM_PROFILE , INTEREST , GRADE ) VALUES ( SEQ_MBNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , 1 )
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEM_PROFILE = ? WHERE MEM_NO = SEQ_MBNO.CURRVAL
SELECT COUNT(*) "COUNT" FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) "COUNT" FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_NICKNAME = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) "COUNT" FROM REGISTER WHERE MEM_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) "COUNT" FROM LIKE WHERE MEM_NO = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEM_NICKNAME = ? , MEM_EMAIL = ? , MEM_PHONE = ? , MEM_ADDR = ? , GENDER = ? , MEM_BIRTH = ? , MEM_PROFILE = ? , INTEREST = ? , MEM_UPDATE = SYSDATE WHERE MEM_ID = ?

SELECT MEM_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , MEM_NAME , MEM_NICKNAME , MEM_EMAIL , MEM_PHONE , MEM_ADDR , GENDER , MEM_BIRTH , MEM_PROFILE , INTEREST , GRADE , ENROLL_DATE , MEM_UPDATE , MEM_STATUS , MEM_DROP FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = ? AND MEM_STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEM_PWD = ? , MEM_UPDATE = SYSDATE WHERE MEM_ID = ? AND MEM_PWD = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEM_DROP = ? , MEM_STATUS = 'N' WHERE MEM_ID = ? AND MEM_PWD = ?

SELECT MEM_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , MEM_NAME , MEM_NICKNAME , MEM_EMAIL , MEM_PHONE , MEM_ADDR , GENDER , MEM_BIRTH , MEM_PROFILE , INTEREST , GRADE , ENROLL_DATE , MEM_UPDATE , MEM_STATUS , MEM_DROP FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_NO = ? AND MEM_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT R.REG_NO , C.CL_NAME , D.DISTR_NAME , R.TEACH_DATE , S.START_TIME , TO_CHAR(REG_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') "REG_DATE" , R.REG_STA , T.TT_NAME , C.CL_THUMB FROM REGISTER R , CLASS C , DISTRICT D , SCHEDULE S , TUTOR T WHERE R.CL_NO = C.CL_NO AND C.DISTR_CODE = D.DISTR_CODE AND R.SCH_NO = S.SCH_NO AND C.MEM_NO = T.MEM_NO AND R.MEM_NO = ?
